short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Debug and inspect layouts by outlining elements with Layout Inspector to fix design issues quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Layout Inspector
The Layout Inspector extension helps web developers and designers quickly debug and inspect the layout of any webpage. With a single click, it outlines every element on the page, making it easier to visualize their placement and structure. This tool is especially useful for detecting layout issues, alignment problems, and spacing inconsistencies without needing to open complex developer tools.

Why You Should Install It:
Easy Debugging: Instantly view the outline of all elements on a webpage to identify layout problems.
Efficient Design Inspection: Quickly check the structure and positioning of elements, saving time during design and development.
User-Friendly: Simple one-click activation and toggling without the need to dig into complicated settings or developer tools.
Helps in Fixing Alignment Issues: Ideal for fixing CSS issues, improving web page layout design, and ensuring elements are correctly positioned.
